name: Princess Cinderella Mini Golf
description:
Enter Cinderella’s mini golf park and play all the marvelous courses.
You will find breathtaking courses located in an enchanted fair world where dragons, unicorns and magic portals are at home.
The first couple of courses will be relatively easy and you can get quite easily a Hole in One. But there after the courses get trickier with every hole.
There are bends, magic portal tunnels, castles, ramps to jump over, swinging spiked clubs and much more.
Find the shortest and easiest path to the hole and remember to collect the crystal slipper to rise your score. Do not hit the golf ball too hard, or you will end up with your ball knocked into the water, out of track or else.

If you love mini golf games, princess action games, golfing games, best mini games, golfer games, princess games or golf putting apps games then you will love the free and cool Princess Cinderella Mini Golf game. Try it out and download Princess Cinderella Mini Golf now!

Features of Princess Cinderella Free Mini Golf game:
✓ Awesome 3D graphics
✓ Lovely animations
✓ 18 fun courses
✓ Direction arrow with power bar to stroke (hit)
✓ Realistic physics and ball movement
✓ Collectible jewels to increase your score
✓ Easy and fun to play
✓ Magical Game - Lady Game - Sweet Princess Game


Regardless of how you are used to call it mini golf, goofy golf, mini putt or else Princess Cinderella Mini Golf is a free Cinderela game and fantastic time killer game.
